metadata.Title: CVE-2023-2576 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions starting from 13.7 before 15.11.10, all versions starting from 16.0 before 16.0.6, all versions starting from 16.1 before 16.1.1. This allowed a developer to remove the CODEOWNERS rules and merge to a protected branch.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
